description: This Dart file defines a GameProvider class for managing the state of a Tic-Tac-Toe game in a Flutter app. It handles the game board, player turns, detecting wins, resets, and game initialization.

classes.name: GameProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier class managing the game state for Tic-Tac-Toe, including board state, current player, winner determination, and game controls.

methods.name: reset
methods.description: Resets the game board to an initial empty state and sets the current player to X.

methods.name: newGame
methods.description: Starts a new game, alternating the starting player between X and O for fairness.

methods.name: playAt
methods.description: Attempts to place the current player's mark at a specified index on the board, checks for a win or draw, and updates the game state accordingly.

methods.name: _togglePlayer
methods.description: Switches the current player between X and O.

methods.name: _checkWin
methods.description: Checks the current board state for a winning line and returns the winning Player if found, otherwise null.
